game.name: Make it! Kushikatsu
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Get ready for a delicious kushikatsu-making challenge! Make tons of kushikatsu and watch your food cart prosper!
